_meanings:
The country of the Magadhas or south Behar.
Its old capital was {#girivraja#} (or {#rAjagfha#}) which 
consisted of five hills {#vipulagiri, ratnAgiri, udayagiri, SoRagiri#},
and {#vEBAra-#} (or {#vyAhAra-#}) {#giri#}. Its next capital was
PƒÅtaliputra <ab>q. v.</ab> Magadha was also called {#kIkawa#} in
later literature.
